about__content: I'm a programmer passionate about building scalable, high-quality applications across web and mobile platforms. I focus on designing clean and maintainable architectures, setting up automated CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring code quality through thorough reviews and testing. With experience across the full stack, I enjoy solving complex problems, improving system performance, and collaborating with teams to deliver solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also drive real business value.
experience__content: A look into my recent experiences and adventures in the tech industry.
